sentences.en: A storm rose, and we had to bale out our boat.
sentences.cn: 下起了暴风雨, 我们不得不舀出船里的水.

sentences.en: Bale - discharging alternatives: turn out, out, forward or manual discharging.
sentences.cn: 放电的办法: 旋转出, 推出, 向前或手动放电.

sentences.en: Bale had only one year left on his Southampton contract.
sentences.cn: 贝尔与南安普顿的合同只剩下一年.

sentences.en: Be bale to work under pressure and adapt to shift.
sentences.cn: 能在压力下工作,适应轮班.

sentences.en: But I'm just AS strong AS he is, and can match him bale for bale, hoisting the 50-pound sacks of seed we fill the truck with.
sentences.cn: 但是我跟他一样地强壮，论体力我们可以一对一地较量，在把每包重50磅的种子扛上卡车时，他扛一包，我也能扛一包。

sentences.en: Enclosed please find an invoice for 100 bale of cotton fabric.
sentences.cn: 随函附上棉布100包发货票一份.

sentences.en: Guidance unsold stoke here estimate 300000 bale.
sentences.cn: 谨提供作为参考:库存尚未售完,估计有30万包.

sentences.en: I sat on a bale of straw near the fire.
sentences.cn: 我坐在炉火边的一捆稻草上.

sentences.en: The concrete methods of improving cotton bale blending evenness are put forward.
sentences.cn: 提出了提高棉包混和均匀性的具体方法.

sentences.en: The rogues were satisfied with her bale up.
sentences.cn: 歹徒们见她把钱立刻交了出来,便满足了.

sentences.en: They use a big machine to bale hay.
sentences.cn: 他们用一部大机器将干草捆包.

sentences.en: Tidings of bale she brought ( William Cullen Bryant )
sentences.cn: 她带来不幸的消息 ( 威廉卡伦布赖恩特 )

sentences.en: We hand an order for: 100 bale, sheep skin.
sentences.cn: 兹寄上订单一份: “100包羊皮. ”

sentences.en: We will rub on the bale with before same ma?
sentences.cn: 我们将在货包上刷上和以前一样的唛头 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: a large quantity of something such as paper or  hay  that is tightly tied together especially into a block

trans.tran_cn: 将某物打成包或包装成捆
